snippet: Frank Fiorentino serves sandwiches to regulars just as he did in 1978, when he opened Domand delicatessen in the Castle Hill neighborhood.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Domand Deli and Caterers, delicatessen that is one of last remnants Italian enclave that once thrived in Castle Hill, Bronx.
lead_paragraph: Frank Fiorentino serves sandwiches to regulars just as he did in 1978, when he opened Domand delicatessen in the Castle Hill neighborhood.

headline.print_headline: The Deli That Just Rolls With It
headline.main: Heroes and Hot Dogs in a Changing Bronx
